com.cloudera.director.spi.v1.model.util

Class AbstractConfigurationProperty

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cloudera.director.spi.v1.model.util.AbstractProperty<ConfigurationProperty.Widget>
      • com.cloudera.director.spi.v1.model.util.AbstractConfigurationProperty
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ConfigurationProperty, Property<ConfigurationProperty.Widget>, Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SimpleConfigurationProperty

    public abstract class AbstractConfigurationProperty
extends AbstractProperty<ConfigurationProperty.Widget>
implements ConfigurationProperty
    Abstract base class for configuration property implementations.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • AbstractConfigurationProperty

        protected AbstractConfigurationProperty(String configKey,
                             Property.Type type,
                             String name,
                             boolean required,
                             ConfigurationProperty.Widget widget,
                             String defaultValue,
                             String defaultDescription,
                             String defaultErrorMessage,
                             List<String> validValues,
                             boolean sensitive,
                             boolean hidden)
        Creates an abstract configuration property with the specified parameters.
        Parameters:
        configKey - the configuration key
        type - the type of the configuration property, or null to use the default type of STRING
        name - the default human-readable name of the configuration property, for error messages and labels, used when a localized name cannot be found, or null to use the configuration key
        required - whether the configuration property is required
        widget - the widget used to display and edit values of the configuration property, or null to use the default TEXT widget
        defaultValue - the default value of the configuration property
        defaultDescription - the default human-readable description of the configuration property, used when a localized description cannot be found
        defaultErrorMessage - the default human-readable error message for when a required configuration property is missing, used when a localized error message cannot be found, or null to use a sensible default message
        validValues - the default list of valid values for this configuration property
        sensitive - whether the configuration property contains sensitive information
        hidden - whether the configuration property should be hidden from the user interface

      • getValidValues

        public List<ConfigurationPropertyValue> getValidValues(LocalizationContext localizationContext)
        Description copied from interface: ConfigurationProperty
        Returns a list of valid values for the configuration property with localized labels. Normally applies to properties that use LIST, OPENLIST, MULTI, or OPENMULTI widgets, but can apply to other widget types.
